me.timothy.loansbot

Class LoansBot

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.timothy.loansbot.LoansBot

  • public class LoansBot
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles the functions of the LoansBot (such as replying to comments, checking if a comment summons the LoansBot, etc) but does not contain the connecting logic (looping through each comment that has to be checked and checking it, for example)

    This class does NOT ever sleep, so you may run into API restrictions. In an effort to standardize the various error protocols that jReddit uses, this uses a C-like error system.
    Author:
    Timothy

      • loginReddit

        public boolean loginReddit(java.lang.String username,
                  java.lang.String password)
                    throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Logs in to reddit. Upon failure use getLastException to see the issue.
        Parameters:
        username - Username of the reddit account
        password - Password of the reddit account
        Returns:
        true on success, false on failure
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the rest client is null

      • isSummonedBy

        public boolean isSummonedBy(java.lang.String text)
        Returns if the loans bot is being summoned by the specified comment
        Parameters:
        text - The text to scan for summoning
        Returns:
        if the bot is being summoned by the text. This does not verify the summon is correct, however

      • parse

        public SummonInformation parse(java.lang.String userPerformingAction,
                      java.lang.String userActedUpon,
                      java.lang.String comment)
        Parses the specified comment for summon information. If the summoning is not there or the summon is incorrect, then null is returned
        Parameters:
        userPerformingAction - The user who is requesting the action (the person who commented)
        userActedUpon - If this is a comment inside a thread, then this would be the threads author
        comment - the comment to parse
        Returns:
        the summon information, or null
